delete.description: Removes a user from a profile. Requires profile-scoped API key.

403.description: Forbidden - API key doesn't have access to this profile

get.description: Retrieves a specific user by ID. Requires profile-scoped API key.

403.description: Forbidden - API key doesn't have access to this profile

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a user invitation using the invitation token. Verifies that the invitation belongs to the specified profile. This endpoint is public and does not require authentication.
Retrieves all users associated with a profile. Requires profile-scoped API key. Supports pagination.

403.description: Forbidden - API key doesn't have access to this profile

post.description: Sends an invitation to a user to join a profile with a specified role. Requires profile-scoped API key. If the user already exists with 'invited' status, resends the invitation with a new token.

200.description: Invitation sent successfully (creates new invitation or resends if user already invited)

403.description: Forbidden - API key doesn't have access to this profile

put.description: Updates a user's role within a profile. Requires profile-scoped API key.

403.description: Forbidden - API key doesn't have access to this profile

delete.description: Removes a user from an organization. Requires organization-scoped API key.

403.description: Forbidden - API key doesn't have access to this organization

get.description: Retrieves a specific user by ID. Requires organization-scoped API key.

403.description: Forbidden - API key doesn't have access to this organization

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a user invitation using the invitation token. Verifies that the invitation belongs to the specified organization. This endpoint is public and does not require authentication.
Retrieves all users associated with an organization. Requires organization-scoped API key. Supports pagination.

403.description: Forbidden - API key doesn't have access to this organization

post.description: Sends an invitation to a user to join an organization with a specified role. Requires organization-scoped API key. If the user already exists with 'invited' status, resends the invitation with a new token.

200.description: Invitation sent successfully (creates new invitation or resends if user already invited)

403.description: Forbidden - API key doesn't have access to this organization

put.description: Updates a user's role within an organization. Requires organization-scoped API key.

403.description: Forbidden - API key doesn't have access to this organization

get.description: Checks the health of the Sent Public API Endpoints.
Kubernetes liveness probe. Returns 200 if the application is running.
Kubernetes readiness probe. Returns 200 when application is ready to serve traffic.

get.summary: Get a specific contact by ID for a profile
get.description: Retrieves a specific contact by its ID for the given profile. Returns metadata about ownership and permissions. The contact must be accessible to the profile (either owned or inherited).

parameters.name: profileId
parameters.description: The profile ID from the route path

parameters.name: contactId
parameters.description: The contact ID from the route path

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid profile-scoped API key required

403.description: Forbidden - API key does not have access to this profile

get.summary: Get paginated contacts for a profile with inheritance
get.description: Retrieves contacts for a specific profile, including inherited contacts from parent organization and sibling profiles (if inheritance is enabled). The isInherited flag indicates if a contact is inherited. Clients should compute permissions based on isInherited and the profile's allowContactSharing setting.

parameters.name: profileId
parameters.description: The profile ID from the route path

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number (1-based indexing). Default is 1.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items per page. Default is 20.

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Optional search term to filter contacts by phone number

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Optional channel filter (e.g., "sms", "whatsapp")

200.description: Contacts retrieved successfully with inheritance metadata

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid profile-scoped API key required

403.description: Forbidden - API key does not have access to this profile

get.summary: Get paginated templates for a profile with inheritance
get.description: Retrieves templates for a specific profile, including inherited templates from sibling profiles (if inheritance is enabled). Includes metadata about ownership and permissions for each template.

parameters.name: profileId
parameters.description: The profile ID from the route path

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number (1-indexed). Default is 1.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items per page. Default is 20.

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Optional search term to filter templates by display name

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Optional status filter (e.g., "APPROVED", "PENDING", "DRAFT")

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Optional category filter

200.description: Templates retrieved successfully with inheritance metadata

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid profile-scoped API key required

403.description: Forbidden - API key does not have access to this profile

post.summary: Send message via profile to contact
post.description: Sends a message to a specific contact using a template through a profile. The message can be sent via SMS or WhatsApp depending on the contact's capabilities. The profile must have access to both the contact and the template (either owned or inherited).

parameters.name: profileId
parameters.description: The profile ID from the route path

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid profile-scoped API key required

403.description: Forbidden - API key does not have access to this profile

delete.description: Deletes a specific message template by its unique identifier for the authenticated customer with smart deletion strategy. Deletion behavior: - If template has NO messages: Permanently deleted from database (hard delete). - If template has messages: Marked as deleted but preserved for message history (soft delete with snapshot). The template must exist and belong to the authenticated customer to be deleted successfully. The customer ID is extracted from the authentication token.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier (GUID) of the resource to retrieve

204.description: Template deleted successfully - no content returned

403.description: Forbidden

get.summary: Get template by ID with enhanced metadata
get.description: Retrieves a specific message template by its unique identifier for the authenticated customer with comprehensive template definitions including headers, body, footer, and interactive buttons. The customer ID is extracted from the authentication token.

200.description: Template found and returned successfully with enhanced metadata

multiChannel.template: Hello {{1:variable}}, thank you for joining our service. We're excited to help you with your messaging needs!

403.description: Forbidden

get.summary: Get contact by ID for authenticated customer
get.description: Retrieves a specific contact by their unique identifier for the authenticated customer. The customer ID is extracted from the authentication token. Returns detailed contact information including phone number and creation timestamp.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier (GUID) of the resource to retrieve

403.description: Forbidden

get.summary: Get contact by phone number for authenticated customer
get.description: Retrieves a contact by their phone number for the authenticated customer. Phone number should be in international format (e.g., +1234567890). The customer ID is extracted from the authentication token.

parameters.name: phoneNumber
parameters.description: The phone number in international format (e.g., +1234567890)

403.description: Forbidden

get.summary: Get paginated contacts for authenticated customer
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of contacts for the authenticated customer. Supports server-side pagination with configurable page size. The customer ID is extracted from the authentication token.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number (zero-indexed). Default is 0.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items per page. Default is 20.

200.description: Contacts retrieved successfully with pagination metadata

403.description: Forbidden

get.description: Retrieves comprehensive details about a specific message using the message ID. Returns complete message data including delivery status, channel information, template details, contact information, and pricing. The customer ID is extracted from the authentication token to ensure the message belongs to the authenticated customer.

messageBody.content: Welcome to our service, John! We're excited to have you.

403.description: Forbidden

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a phone number including validation, formatting, country information, and available messaging channels. The customer ID is extracted from the authentication token.

403.description: Forbidden

get.summary: Get all templates for authenticated customer with enhanced metadata and filtering
get.description: Retrieves all message templates available for the authenticated customer with comprehensive template definitions including headers, body, footer, and interactive buttons. Supports advanced filtering by search term, status, and category, plus pagination. The customer ID is extracted from the authentication token.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number (zero-indexed). Default is 0.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items per page (1-1000). Default is 100.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Optional search term to filter templates by name or content

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Optional filter by template status (e.g., APPROVED, PENDING, REJECTED, DRAFT)

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Optional filter by template category (e.g., MARKETING, UTILITY, AUTHENTICATION)

200.description: Templates retrieved successfully with enhanced metadata and pagination

multiChannel.template: Hello {{1:variable}}, thank you for joining our service. We're excited to help you with your messaging needs!

403.description: Forbidden

post.summary: Create a new template with enhanced metadata and optional submission for review
post.description: Creates a new message template for the authenticated customer with comprehensive template definitions including headers, body, footer, and interactive buttons. Supports automatic metadata generation using AI (display name, language, category). Optionally submits the template for WhatsApp review. The customer ID is extracted from the authentication token.

403.description: Forbidden

post.description: Sends a message to a specific contact using a template. The message can be sent via SMS or WhatsApp depending on the contact's capabilities. Optionally specify a webhook URL to receive delivery status updates. The customer ID is extracted from the authentication token.

403.description: Forbidden

post.description: Sends a message to a phone number using a template. The phone number doesn't need to be a pre-existing contact. The message can be sent via SMS or WhatsApp. Optionally specify a webhook URL to receive delivery status updates. The customer ID is extracted from the authentication token.

403.description: Forbidden

post.summary: Send quick message with default template (rate limited to 5 per day)
post.description: Sends a message to a phone number using the default template. This endpoint is rate limited to 5 messages per customer per day. The customer ID is extracted from the authentication token.

403.description: Forbidden

get.summary: Get authenticated user's organizations with sender profiles
get.description: Retrieves all organizations that the authenticated user has access to, including the sender profiles within each organization that the user can access. Returns organization details with nested profiles filtered by user permissions.

200.description: Organizations with accessible profiles retrieved successfully

403.description: Forbidden

get.description: Retrieves all sender profiles within an organization that the authenticated user has access to. Returns filtered list based on user's permissions.

403.description: Forbidden - User doesn't have access to this organization

post.summary: Create/invite user to organization or profile
post.description: Invites a user to an organization or sender profile with a specified role. Requires appropriate permissions. The customerId can be either an organization ID or a profile ID.

403.description: Forbidden - You don't have permission to add users

get.summary: Get users in organization or profile
get.description: Retrieves all users associated with an organization or sender profile. Requires appropriate permissions. Supports pagination.

403.description: Forbidden - You don't have access to this organization/profile

delete.description: Removes a user from an organization or sender profile. Requires admin permissions. This action permanently deletes the user association.

403.description: Forbidden - You don't have permission to delete users

get.description: Retrieves a specific user by their ID. Requires appropriate permissions. The customerId can be either an organization ID or a profile ID.

403.description: Forbidden - You don't have access to this organization/profile

put.description: Updates a user's role within an organization or sender profile. Requires admin permissions. Valid roles are: admin, billing, developer.

403.description: Forbidden - You don't have permission to update user roles

allOf.description:
v3 API paginated response for user lists
Uses "items" property for consistency with other v3 responses (contacts, templates)

SentDmServicesEndpointsCustomerAPIv3Cont.description: Request for getting a specific contact by ID for a profile
Request for getting contacts for a specific profile with pagination

SentDmServicesCommonContractsPOCOsTempla.description: Complete definition of a message template including header, body, footer, and buttons

header.description: Optional template header with optional variables

body.description: Required template body with content for different channels (multi-channel, SMS-specific, or WhatsApp-specific)

footer.description: Optional template footer with optional variables

buttons.description: Optional list of interactive buttons (e.g., quick replies, URLs, phone numbers)

definitionVersion.description: The version of the template definition format

authenticationConfig.description: Configuration specific to AUTHENTICATION category templates (optional)

SentDmServicesCommonContractsPOCOsTempla.description: Header section of a message template

template.description: The header template text with optional variable placeholders (e.g., "Welcome to {{0:variable}}")

variables.description: List of variables used in the header template

SentDmServicesCommonContractsPOCOsTempla.description: Body section of a message template with channel-specific content

multiChannel.description: Content that will be used for all channels (SMS and WhatsApp) unless channel-specific content is provided

sms.description: SMS-specific content that overrides multi-channel content for SMS messages

whatsapp.description: WhatsApp-specific content that overrides multi-channel content for WhatsApp messages

SentDmServicesCommonContractsPOCOsTempla.description: Footer section of a message template

template.description: The footer template text with optional variable placeholders

variables.description: List of variables used in the footer template

SentDmServicesCommonContractsPOCOsTempla.description: Interactive button in a message template

id.description: The unique identifier of the button (1-based index)

type.description: The type of button (e.g., QUICK_REPLY, URL, PHONE_NUMBER, VOICE_CALL, COPY_CODE)

props.description: Properties specific to the button type

addSecurityRecommendation.description: Whether to add the security recommendation text: "For your security, do not share this code."

codeExpirationMinutes.description: Code expiration time in minutes (1-90). If set, adds footer: "This code expires in X minutes."

SentDmServicesEndpointsCustomerAPIv3Cont.description: Request for getting templates for a specific profile with pagination
Request to send a message to a specific contact using a template via a profile

contactId.description: The unique identifier of the contact to send the message to

templateId.description: The unique identifier of the template to use for the message

templateVariables.description:
Optional key-value pairs of template variables to replace in the template body.
For example, if your template contains "Hello {{name}}", you would provide { "name": "John Doe" }

allOf.description: Request to retrieve a resource by its unique identifier (v2)

SentDmServicesEndpointsCustomerAPIv2Cont.description: Represents a contact in the customer's contact list

id.description: The unique identifier of the contact

phoneNumber.description: The phone number in its original format

formatE164.description: The phone number formatted in E.164 standard (e.g., +1234567890)

formatInternational.description: The phone number formatted for international dialing (e.g., +1 234-567-890)

formatNational.description: The phone number formatted for national dialing (e.g., (234) 567-890)

formatRfc.description: The phone number formatted according to RFC 3966 (e.g., tel:+1-234-567-890)

countryCode.description: The country calling code (e.g., 1 for US/Canada)

regionCode.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g., US, CA, GB)

availableChannels.description: Comma-separated list of available messaging channels for this contact (e.g., "sms,whatsapp")

defaultChannel.description: The default messaging channel to use for this contact (e.g., "sms" or "whatsapp")

allOf.description: Request to retrieve a resource by its unique identifier
Request to retrieve a resource by phone number
Paginated response containing a list of customer contacts

SentDmServicesEndpointsCustomerAPIv2Cont.description: Represents a sent message with comprehensive delivery and template information (v2)

id.description: The unique identifier of the message

customerId.description: The unique identifier of the customer who sent the message

contactId.description: The unique identifier of the contact who received the message

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the recipient (E.164 format)

phoneNumberInternational.description: The phone number in international format

regionCode.description: The region code of the phone number (e.g., US, GB, DE)

templateId.description: The unique identifier of the template used for this message (null if no template was used)

templateName.description: The display name of the template

templateCategory.description: The category of the template (e.g., MARKETING, UTILITY, AUTHENTICATION)

channel.description: The messaging channel used (e.g., SMS, WhatsApp)

messageBody.description: The message body content with variables substituted

status.description: The delivery status of the message (e.g., sent, delivered, failed, read)

createdAt.description: The date and time when the message was created

correctedPrice.description: The final price charged for sending this message

events.description:
A chronological list of status change events for this message.
Each event includes a status and timestamp, following industry standards (Twilio, SendGrid, Mailgun).
Events are ordered chronologically from oldest to newest.

SentDmServicesCommonContractsPOCOsMessag.description:
Structured message body format for database storage.
Preserves channel-specific components (header, body, footer, buttons).

SentDmServicesEndpointsCustomerAPIv2Cont.description:
Represents a status change event in a message's lifecycle
Follows industry standards (Twilio, SendGrid, Mailgun pattern)

status.description:
The status of the message at this point in time
Examples: "queued", "sent", "delivered", "read", "failed"

timestamp.description: When this status change occurred (ISO 8601 format)

description.description:
Optional human-readable description of the event
Useful for error messages or additional context

SentDmServicesEndpointsCustomerAPIv2Cont.description: Response containing phone number lookup data

phoneNumber.description: The phone number in its original format

formatE164.description: The phone number formatted in E.164 standard (e.g., +1234567890)

formatInternational.description: The phone number formatted for international dialing (e.g., +1 234-567-890)

formatNational.description: The phone number formatted for national dialing (e.g., (234) 567-890)

formatRfc.description: The phone number formatted according to RFC 3966 (e.g., tel:+1-234-567-890)

countryCode.description: The country calling code (e.g., 1 for US/Canada)

regionCode.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g., US, CA, GB)

numberType.description: The type of phone number (e.g., mobile, fixed_line, voip)

phoneTimezones.description: The timezones associated with the phone number

SentDmServicesEndpointsCustomerAPIv2Cont.description: Represents a message template with comprehensive metadata including definition structure

id.description: The unique identifier of the template

displayName.description: The display name of the template (auto-generated if not provided)

category.description: The template category (e.g., MARKETING, UTILITY, AUTHENTICATION)

language.description: The template language code (e.g., en_US, es_ES)

definition.description: The complete template definition including header, body, footer, and buttons

status.description: The approval status of the template (e.g., APPROVED, PENDING, REJECTED, DRAFT)

isPublished.description: Indicates whether the template is published and available for use

whatsappTemplateId.description: The WhatsApp Business API template ID from Meta

whatsappTemplateName.description: The WhatsApp template name as registered with Meta

createdAt.description: The date and time when the template was created

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the template was last updated

allOf.description: Paginated response containing a list of message templates with comprehensive metadata (v2)
Request to retrieve templates with advanced filtering and pagination
Request to send a message to a specific contact using a template

contactId.description: The unique identifier of the contact to send the message to

templateId.description: The unique identifier of the template to use for the message

templateVariables.description: Optional key-value pairs of template variables to replace in the template body. For example, if your template contains "Hello {{name}}", you would provide { "name": "John Doe" }

allOf.description: Request to send a message to a phone number using a template

phoneNumber.description: The phone number to send the message to, in international format (e.g., +1234567890)

templateId.description: The unique identifier of the template to use for the message

templateVariables.description: Optional key-value pairs of template variables to replace in the template body. For example, if your template contains "Hello {{name}}", you would provide { "name": "John Doe" }

example.customMessage: Hello, this is a test message!

allOf.description: Request to send a quick message using the default template

phoneNumber.description: The phone number to send the message to, in international format (e.g., +1234567890)

customMessage.description: The custom message content to include in the template
customMessage.example: Hello, this is a test message!

multiChannel.template: Hello {{1:variable}}, thank you for joining our service. We're excited to help you with your messaging needs!

allOf.description: Request to create a new message template with comprehensive metadata

category.description: The template category (e.g., MARKETING, UTILITY, AUTHENTICATION). Can only be set when creating a new template. If not provided, will be auto-generated using AI.

language.description: The template language code (e.g., en_US, es_ES). Can only be set when creating a new template. If not provided, will be auto-detected using AI.

definition.description: Template definition containing header, body, footer, and buttons

multiChannel.template: Hello {{1:variable}}, thank you for joining our service. We're excited to help you with your messaging needs!

submitForReview.description:
When false, the template will be saved as draft.
When true, the template will be submitted for review.

CustomerSenderId.description: Customer sender ID (GUID) identifying the customer account
CustomerSenderId.name: x-sender-id
